title.rendered: Outdoor Lifestyle Element, Talus Artisan Fire Bowl, featured in Architectural Digest

content.rendered:
In the May 2016 issue of Architectural Digest, an installation shot of the Talus Artisan Fire Bowl is featured in the “Outdoor Living: Summer Stock” article. The description includes details on the fire bowl material, size, and price, and a link to the Eldorado Outdoor webpage. The feature can be found on page 54 of the May 2016 issue of Architectural Digest, a national publication that targets sophisticated and affluent readers interested in architecture and design.

See more details about the Talus Artisan Fire Bowl here.
